import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useAuthContext } from "../hooks/useAuthContext"; import { useLogout } from "../hooks/userLogout"; const Header = () => { const { user } = useAuthContext(); const { logout } = useLogout(); const [showDropdown, setShowDropdown] = useState(false); const toggleDropdown = () => setShowDropdown(!showDropdown); // Dummy wallet data — replace with dynamic values if available const walletData = { investment: "₹12,500", profile: "₹3,200", wallet: "₹9,300", }; return (
  • what is xpo

) : (
{showDropdown && (

Wallet Overview

Name: {user?.name}

Email: {user?.email}

{user?.PhoneNumber &&

Phone: {user.PhoneNumber}

}

Investment: {walletData.investment}

Profile Balance: {walletData.profile}

Wallet: {walletData.wallet}

)}
)}
); }; export default Header;
